lead_paragraph: The expansion Chicago Sky (4-29) set a W.N.B.A. record with their 29th loss of the season last night, an 84-57 defeat against the host Charlotte Sting. Charlotte had set the mark with a 6-28 record last season. Washington has the worst winning percentage in league history — 3-27 (.100) in 1998.
